name: Taylormade Public Relations
description:
TaylorMadePR is a London based luxury PR and Marketing agency in Mayfair, London, we specialise in PR and Marketing services within the luxury travel and lifestyle sectors, facilitating mutually beneficial partnerships between brands. We provide traditional media relations, social media and sales & marketing services and have worked with various tourism boards and luxury 5* star group hotels.
TaylorMadePR, uses a network of proven senior staff to deliver high impact and award winning campaigns. As a result, clients always have access to experienced account handlers who understand their brand and need for bottom line results. We deliver high value successful campaigns with tangible results, through our relationships and proven processes.Specialising in leading brands and launches in luxury travel and tourism, restaurants, wine and lifestyle-related sectors, we build brands and awareness for our clients with the right audiences, through strategic and tailored public relations and marketing 360Â° campaigns.
